Intro
Whats up guys and girls, welcome!I'm an Alt Pop/Rock artist from Hull, currently based in London writing/releasing music and playing live. My music consists dirty guitar tones, anthemic choruses, and punching beats that sit in a hip hop groove. My first single "Trouble (Pull That Trigger)" was released after a Billboard premiere, and has since then, had the support of champions within the press, the BBC and of course my loyal supporters. I am now about to release my second single "MAD", and currently planning recording for future singles, and eventually an EP.
Campaign
I'm putting together a crowd funding campaign to make this recording process possible, as with currently being an independent artist, many hit the financial wall when it comes to being able to afford the things like PR, music video, artwork and merch production etc. As an artist i know exactly what i want to do, and how to do it, now i just need your support!If you would like more music, for making a financial contribution to my campaign, you shall not only recieve one of the bad ass gifts in the websites "perks" section, but you of course WILL be able to have more music being produced and released by myself, a LOT faster.
What YOU Will Get In Return
In return for your contribution towards making my goal a reality, you will recieve perks such asSigned T Shirt Signed PosterA Cover Of Your Favourite Song 1 hour vocal lesson Dinner with Izzy Thomas & friendExclusive behind the scenes footage& more!
How Much I Want To Raise
I need to raise £4k, this will go towards* Studio fees (Mixing/Mastering)* Music videos * Paying musicians * Artwork/graphic design * CD printing/distribution * Publicity/promotion * Distribution/shipping * Single release eventsIf i don't reach my entire goal, whatever i have earned will go towards studio time.
What Impact Will This Have On You, & The Rest Of The World?
Right now lets face it, popular music is on its arse. My goal is to introduce guitar back in to the music world, before kids even forget what it is..I want to create music with meaning, empowering music. Music that the youth of today will be humming the melodies to when they are older. I honestly dont remember 80 percent of the stuff that comes on the radio, because i feel a lot of it is lacking substance. I am inspired by new artists like Rag 'N' Bone Man, Lewis Capaldi, Bishop Briggs, and of course legends like MJ, Audioslave, Lenny Kravitz & Christina Aguilera who all said something within their music.If i raise over my target, remaining funds will be put towards more school tours, where i will continue to perform in secondary school assembilies, and educate students on the importance of Autism wareness, mental health, equality and cyber bullying. Also, a possible full band venue tour around the UK.
Thank you for taking your time to read this, if you support me with this, you WILL recieve more music from me, and eternal respect for your loyalty and faith.
Much love, Izzy X

story:
Breve reseña

Hola amigos, es la primera vez que hago un crowdfunding o Vaca para hacer un disco nuevo!
A los que ya me conocen, saben quien y como soy y que la música es mi pasión y mi expresión artística desde hace muchos años y a los que no me conocen como seguramente recibirán esta petición de contribución por algún buen amigo pueden preguntarle ¿Quien es este personaje?
También pueden entrar en www.octaviosuñe.com y escuchar discos anteriores, leer la biografía, redes sociales, etc etc.

Hi friends, it's my first time making crowdfunding for a new Album!
To those who know me, know who and how I am and that music is my passion and artistic expression for many years and those who do not know me as surely receive this request for contribution from a good friend you can ask who is this character?
U also can go in www.octaviosuñe.com and see Bio, listen to previows albums, social network, etc etc.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Para hacer un disco se necesitan:
Canciones, músicos, un estudio de grabación, un estudio de mastering y productores ejecutivos (son los que financian el proyecto) en este caso serán Ustedes!
El nuevo disco estará compuesto de 11 canciones.

Así se usará tu contribución al nuevo disco:
Estudio de grabación y mezcla = 2.000 $
Estudio de mastering = 1.000 $
Diseño gráfico = 350 $
Fabricación de cd's con empaque ecológico = 1.000 $
Comisión Indiegogo & Paypal = 350 $
Catering y gastos de producción = 300 $
Total = 5.000 $

Que obtienen al financiar este nuevo disco:
En primer lugar un agradecimiento sincero en la pagina web y en el disco.
En segundo lugar la seguridad de saber como, cuando y donde va a ser usada su contribución al proyecto.
En tercer lugar la satisfacción de haber contribuido a la publicación de un nuevo trabajo musical independiente, ya saben la música es alimento para el alma...
Y en cuarto lugar corroborar que en la unión esta la fuerza.
Ojo! también hay recompensas materiales, se muestran según tu aporte!

To make a record you need:
Songs, musicians, a recording studio, a studio mastering and executive producers (they are financing the project) in this case will be You!
The new album will consist of 11 songs.

Your contributions will be used to the new disk this way:
Recording & mixing Studio = $ 2.000
Mastering studio = $ 1.000
Graphic Design = $ 350
Making CD's with ecological packaging = $ 1.000
Indiegogo & Paypal Commission = $ 350
Catering & production expenses = $ 300
Total = $ 5.000

What you get to fund this new album:
First, a sincere thank you on the website and on disk.
Secondly, the security of knowing how, when and where it will be used your contribution to the project.
Thirdly, the satisfaction of having contributed to the publication of a new independent musical work, you know music is food for the soul ...
And fourth corroborate that union is strength.
Ah! There are also material rewards are shown according to your input!

El impacto

Llevo muchos años haciendo discos, los he hecho con discográficas multinacionales y también de manera independiente, el mundo de la música cambia constante y rapidamente y tener la oportunidad de utilizar una herramienta como esta para financiar un proyecto artístico me parece sencillamente genial!
Antes solo podían financiar sus proyectos gente que tuviera el dinero necesario, artistas firmados por compañías multinacionales o quienes tuvieran a los Reyes como mecenas.
Hoy en día Ustedes son los mecenas de los nuevos proyectos artísticos!

I have spent many years making records, I've done with multinational record labels and independently, the music world is changing constantly and quickly and have the opportunity to use a tool like this to fund an art project feel just great!
Before today could finance their projects only people who had the money, artists signed by multinational companies or who have the Kings as a patron.
Today You are the patron of the new art projects!

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

No importa si no puedes colaborar especificamente con dinero en este momento, seguro conoces a un par de personas que les gustaría participar en este proyecto, solo tienes que pasarles esta información y así también estarás ayudando un montón!

No matter if you can not work specifically with money now, you sure know a couple of people who would like to participate in this project, just pass on this information and so too will be helping a lot!

story:
My name is Anand Balroop and I’m an Indian Classical Singer and Composer. I was born and raised in Montreal Canada where I currently reside as well. I am looking to release two traditional albums. I've been learning music since I was 8 years old. I first started my training learning tabla and dholak from two very prominent musicians from the West Indies. From the age of 10 to current day, I have been accompanying and performing with many artists from India, Pakistan, Trinidad and Guyana. At age 13, I started learning Indian classical singing. I'm fluent in English, Hindi and Bhojpuri but sing in various other languages as well. I am specialized in Bhajan, Ghazal, Qawwali, Bollywood and Baithak Gana.

The project that I'm interested in, and in my expertise, is to do two traditional recordings; one Bhajan and one Baithak Gana.

Bhajan is a type of Hindu devotional music going back many centuries. It can be as reciting a mantra in various basic melodies and rhythms or complex using very intense ragas. For my Bhajan recording I will site some very major poets from the Bhakti movement era (800-1700) such as Surdas, Tulsi Das and Sant Kabir.

Baithak Gana is a form of music originating in Trinidad, Guyana and Suriname by the Hindustani community. It is a mix of Bhojpuri folk songs with other Caribbean influences. This contemporary fusion of genres was created by the Indo-Caribbean people whose ancestors were from Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Bengal and South India area around Madras. The Baithak Gana recording I’m planning to release is a collection of traditional Baithak Gana songs from Trinidad, Guyana and Suriname going as far back as 1833 from when indentured servants arrived in the Caribbean with lyrics depicting scenes of various text such as Ramayan, Bhagavad Gita, Mahabharat, Krishna Leela and Ram Leela.

How your contributions will help

1)  Recording, mixing and mastering

2)  Musicians

3)  Photography

4)  Art work and graphic design

5)  Web hosting

6)  Publicity and licensing

7)  CD pressing and duplication

There are two links on my page the first one being the youtube video is an example of Baithak Gana and the sound cloud link is an example of Bhajan done is a Qawwali style. https://soundcloud.com/anand-balroop/ek-bar-shree-bhole-bhandari 

With your contributions you will help me make a fully professional recording of these two styles and help revive Baithak Gana from a dying art. 

Thank you very much.

story:
Mike Marshall: Full-Length Album Project

Mike Marshall is a singer/songwriter based out of Columbus, Georgia.  He has a passion for humanity to experience the love and healing of God through music.

His first EP, New Grace, released in January of 2021 with three singles:  JESUS, New Grace, and Satisfy.

For Mike’s next project, the Lord impressed on him the theme of healing - physical, mental, and emotional - especially coming out of the year 2020.  He wanted this music to allow people to have a personal, real, healing encounter with God. One verse that is an anchor in his writing and planning process is 1 Samuel 16:23,"Whenever the spirit from God came on Saul, David would take up his lyre and play. Then relief would come to Saul; he would feel better, and the evil spirit would leave him."  This verse is a reminder of the power that music has to bring about real life healing, deliverance, breakthrough, peace...you name it!

In considering the scope of this endeavor, Mike knew he couldn’t do it alone.  He would need prayer and support - it truly will take a village!  Specifically, he needs your prayers - over the songwriting process, the music, and the release.  If you feel led, you can support this project financially through this site. Mike is an independent artist, not currently signed with a label, so your investment in the music has a very real impact. Your contributions will bring this album to life.     

The production process will begin this summer and the live album recording will take place in mid-September, with an anticipated album release date of early 2022.

 

A Message from Mike:

“Since the release of my first EP, I have been encouraged to hear how many of you are experiencing Jesus through the music and lyrics. Your stories have truly inspired much of my writing for this new album.  I cannot wait to share the songs and messages of healing and hope that have come from this season. I believe this project will be right on time for many of you. Thank you for your prayers and support - I am grateful and honored.” -Mike Marshall

story:
Mission Statement

My name is David Floyd and I am with a new metal act out of Lansing, MI called DeverauX. We have only been established for a short amount of time but are gaining ground very quickly. After winning Lansing's "Q106 Homegrown Throwdown" we were able to record a 5 track E.P. entitled "The Last of Us", but have come up short on the funds for duplication. This is where all of you come in.

This is your (the fans) chance to contribute to our cause. We would like to use this as our way of letting you pre-order your copy of "The Last of Us", now. Every person that pays in advance will be in fact making this CD possible.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $1500 to publish our CD. This is what we need it for:

  • $1400 is needed for the pressing and duplication through Disk Makers.
  • $100 is needed for the surcharge through this site.

Even if we don't reach this goal we will still seek other forms of funding and release this E.P. without a doubt. Evey contribution helps greatly.

We are only pressing 1000 CD's and selling them for $5, so if you order now you will guarantee yourself a copy.

Here are your options for contribution:

  • $5   - Pre-Order CD (Guaranteed)
  • $10 - Pre-Order CD and a ticket to the E.P. release show.
  • $20 - Signed pre-order CD and 2 tickets to the E.P. release show.
  • $40 - Signed pre-order CD, a T-Shirt and 2 tickets to the E.P. release show.
  • $50 - Signed pre-order CD, a T-Shirt, 2 tickets to the E.P. release show, a poster and a "meet and greet" with the band before the show.
  • $100 - VIP Package: 2 Signed pre-order CD's, 2 Signed T-Shirts, 4 tickets to the E.P. release show, 2 Signed posters and a "meet and greet" with the band before the show.

The Impact

By making one of these contributions, you not only receive the perks but you are helping our cause at the core. Every person WILL make a difference, not only in helping to produce the CD it self but in furthering our band's career and our message. We value our supporters more than words can express.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Social Networking (i.e. facebook, twitter, youtube, etc...) has become a mainstay in everyday life. This is one of the greatest tools available to bands and their supporters. Even if you can't contribute financially, you can help spread the word about our campaign and our band in general. Thank you.

www.deverauxband.com

www.facebook.com/deverauxband

www.twitter.com/deverauxband
www.reverbnation.com/deverauxband
www.youtube.com/deverauxband
www.myspace.com/deverauxband

story: We are Human Factors Lab. An up and coming industrial Metal band out of Orlando Florida. We have toured in the past with such bands and mushroomed and KMFDM We have just finished recording an amazing album with grammy award winning producer Chris Vrenna, Best known for his work with tweaker, Nine Inch Nails, and Marilyn Manson. Now we are just trying to raise enough money to manufacture a physical CD for our fans. In an age where CDs sales are dwindling and records labels are all but gone, we are trying to do this ourselves so our fans have something they can hold in their hands hands and not just an MP3
